meanings.definition: Small parasitic worms that infest the intestines of humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed medication to treat the threadworms in my intestines.
meanings.sent2: The vet found threadworms in the dog's stool sample.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the threadworms in my belly were having a party.
meanings.sent4: The threadworms in the soil wriggled like tiny dancers.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the discomfort caused by the threadworms in my gut.

meanings.definition: A type of worm that is thin and threadlike in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The biologist studied the threadworms under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: The fisherman found threadworms while digging for bait.
meanings.sent3: The threadworms on the sidewalk looked like tiny pieces of string.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as thin and delicate as a threadworm.
meanings.sent5: The threadworms in the garden blended in with the thin roots of the plants.
